spanish.UI_PEACOCK_PIRATESPROBLEM_CALM_DESC:
Pirates have stolen code from the Haven™ servers, and the staff is in panic.
Calm the staff by pumping a sedative in their ventilation.

spanish.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_MANSION_GUARDS_DESC: These rent a cops actually thought they could come inside the Carlisle Manor! You should have seen the look on their face when we told them to stay outside!
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_MANSION_STAFF_DESC: We just got word two of our guys were taken out. I know these arrogant little assholes are behind it!
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_DISGUISE1: Teach these low grade grunts a thing or two about class and let them know it's coming from one of us.
spanish.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_DISGUISE2: We can't just sit around and do nothing Vincent! I'm going in!

chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_PIRATESPROBLEM_CALM_DESC: 海盗盗取了海文™服务器的代码，工作人员正处于恐慌之中。在工作人员的通气设施中放入镇静剂，使他们平静下来。

chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_MANSION_GUARDS_DESC: 这些临时雇来的警察居然认为他们可以进入卡莱尔庄园！你应该看看当我们告诉他们呆在外面的时候他们滑稽的表情！
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_MANSION_STAFF_DESC: 我们刚刚得到消息，我们的人被干掉了两个。我就知道这些傲慢的小混蛋是幕后黑手！
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_DISGUISE1: 教导这些低级别的蠢货一两件关于阶级的事情，好让他们知道这是来自我们中的一员。
chineseSimplified.UI_PEACOCK_ROSEBUSH_DISGUISE2: 我们不能只是坐在那儿什么都不做，文森特！我要插手了！
